sentences.en: A stunt man needs to have a good guardian angel.
sentences.cn: 当特技替身演员的得有个守护天使来保佑.

sentences.en: Climbing up the church tower a fine publicity stunt.
sentences.cn: 攀登教堂钟楼是“绝妙”的宣传性噱头.

sentences.en: Climbing up the church tower was a fine publicity stunt.
sentences.cn: 攀登教堂钟楼是绝妙的宣传性噱头.

sentences.en: Everyone saw the stunt you pulled on me.
sentences.cn: 大家都看见了你对我耍的花招。

sentences.en: In a bold promotional stunt for the movie, he smashed his car into a passing truck.
sentences.cn: 为了给电影制造噱头以吸引眼球，他把汽车猛地撞向一辆驶过的卡车。

sentences.en: It was all a publicity stunt.
Lack of food may stunt the body.
sentences.cn: 缺乏食物会阻碍身体的发育.

sentences.en: Lack of sunlight will stunt the plant’s growth.
sentences.cn: 缺乏阳光会阻碍植物的生长。

sentences.en: Lack of the right food may stunt growth.
sentences.cn: 缺乏适当的食物会阻碍发育.

sentences.en: Lack of water will stunt the plant's growth.
Lack of water will stunt the plant's growth.
sentences.cn: 缺水会影响植物的生长.

sentences.en: Mercedes pulled the stunt with Tom's car, right?
sentences.cn: 默西迪丝用汤姆的车做道具对不对?

sentences.en: Never again pull a stunt like riding a bicycle no hands.
sentences.cn: 绝对不要玩命,表演像放手骑单车的特技.

sentences.en: Not many actors do their own stunts .
sentences.cn: 不是很多演员亲自表演特技动作。

sentences.en: She has pulled a stunt with her teacher.
The British stunt man Eddie Kidd jumped over the Great Wall of China on a motorcycle.
sentences.cn: 英国特技表演者埃迪·基德骑摩托车飞越了中国长城。

sentences.en: The little boy learned a stunt; he stands on his head.
sentences.cn: 小男孩学了一招, 他能倒立.

sentences.en: Todd flew over the city in a hot-air balloon as a publicity stunt .
sentences.cn: 作为一种宣传噱头，托德乘坐热气球飞越城市上空。

words.tran_cn: 发育不良的；成长受妨碍的；长得矮小的
阻碍…发展（stunt的过去式及过去分词形式）

trans.tran_cn: 惊险动作，特技，噱头，发育不良的动植物
trans.tran_en: something that is done to attract people’s attention, especially in advertising or politics

trans.tran_cn: 阻碍…的正常生长或发展
trans.tran_en: to stop something or someone from growing to their full size or developing properly

trans.tran_cn: 阻碍…发育（生长），抑制，妨碍
trans.tran_en: to stop something or someone from growing to their full size or developing properly
